Welcome to SHADA FC

This is SHADA FC, a where you can start your football journey with. SHADA FC. It's responsive, built on matter, and includes family treatment, you can start you journey with us.

SFC Visionary

Yes! SHADA FC is built to be fully responsive so it looks great at fans eyes, from the bottom to the top we've rise nowadays, it's such beautiful moment ever to started with SHADA FC.

License Info

SHADA FC is licensed under the CAMBODIAN SECOND DIVISION LEAGUE license, SHADA FC use this license to compete in the league and other tournaments.

Commitment to Excellence

Shada FC is dedicated to excellence both on and off the pitch. Join us in our journey to greatness! football club committed to fostering talent, teamwork, and sportsmanship in every match we play.

Who We Are

We Are Shada Fc

Shada FC is a professional football club dedicated to excellence both on and off the pitch. Join us in our journey to greatness! Our club is committed to fostering talent, teamwork, and sportsmanship in every match we play. Representing our community with pride, we strive to be a beacon of inspiration for aspiring athletes and fans alike. We are family, united by our love for the beautiful game.

What We Do

We are thrilled to make history in football

  • Representing CAMBODIAN Football Club
  • Representing Pride of Egypt Culture
  • Shared Experience on and off the pitch
  • Repect to the Game and Community
  • Make chance for all players to get PRO
